slides.title: Basic Plotting
slides.content:
# Basic Plots ğŸ“ˆ

## Matplotlib

```python_not
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot([1, 2, 3], [1, 4, 9])
plt.xlabel('X')
plt.ylabel('Y')
plt.title('Line Plot')
plt.show()
```

## Seaborn

```python_not
import seaborn as sns

sns.histplot(data=df, x='value')
sns.scatterplot(data=df, x='x', y='y', hue='category')
```

# Statistical Plots ğŸ“Š

## Seaborn Specialties

| Plot | Use |
|------|-----|
| histplot | Distribution |
| boxplot | Compare groups |
| heatmap | Correlation |
| pairplot | Multi-variable |

## Example

```python_not
import seaborn as sns

sns.heatmap(df.corr(), annot=True, cmap='coolwarm')
```
